name: tentree Blakely Shortsleeve Knit Jumpsuit - Women's
description:
A comfy jumpsuit for pre- and post-workout relaxing, or just wearing around town.Hidden hook and eye closure at V-neck.Elastic at waist.Soft Treeblend fabric is made of recycled and natural fibres, giving you a clean conscience.tentree’s goal is to construct quality apparel and ensure that ten trees are planted for every article of clothing sold.Regular fit feels just right.
